p: The essential oil was isolated from underground organs of R. rosea in accordance with Polish Pharmacopeia 8th edition, with modifications [ 42]. Air-dried raw material (100 g) was subjected to hydrodistillation for 3 h using a Clevenger-type apparatus. The amount of essential oil was measured on the apparatus scale. The obtained essential oils were stored in dark vials, at 4 Â°C.
